articles.title: 'Unstoppable' Lionel Messi ends 'desperate' goal search for PSG against Man City - BBC Sport
articles.description: Lionel Messi's first PSG goal was the moment European football had been waiting for and the one Pep Guardiola knew was probably "unstoppable".
articles.content:
Lionel Messi's goal was his first at club level since his final Barcelona game, a 2-1 defeat at Celta Vigo in May
It was the moment European football had been waiting for - and the one Pep Guardiola… [+6068 chars]

articles.title: Kildare Senator raises issue of Dementia and Alzheimer's care at Council of Europe meeting - Kildare Now
articles.description: A Kildare Senator and Chair of the All-Party Oireachtas Group on Dementia has succeeded in asking the Council of Europe to prioritise Dementia and Alzheimer’s care at an EU level. Fianna Fáil Senator Fiona O' Loughlin recently called on the Council of Europe,…
articles.content:
A Kildare Senator and Chair of the All-Party Oireachtas Group on Dementia has succeeded in asking the Council of Europe to prioritise Dementia and Alzheimers care at an EU level.

articles.title: Macron says Europe must boost defence and end its 'naivety' in first remarks since Australia snub - Daily Mail
articles.description: The French president was speaking as he announced a multi-billion euro deal to sell three of the country's state-of-the-art Belharra frigates to Greece.
